message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the time value in this game. Let's make a deal!
Bob, let's be realistic. The value decreases faster for you. I'm proposing 62/38.
Alice, it's clear we both want to maximize our gains.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we don't waste any more rounds with inflation eating away at the value. Deal?
